response.overview: THEY ARE HERE begins with friends Bryan and Jason as they aim to film a pilot for a reality television show they envision, following a strange and quirky young man named Damian. Damian believes there is something sinister happening in and around a local small town and he is dedicated to uncover the truth behind the recent strange, UFO sightings in the area. Their journey eventually leads them to a small ranch; the hotbed of alien activity. Soon, they discover the danger exists closer to home.
response.title: They Are Here
